trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> by wrapping the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Hjälper dig att skydda en annan implementering av <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> genom att omsluta den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> objekt och begränsa resurserna som den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> har åtkomst till.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>klass är Standardlösaren för alla klasser i den <xref:System.Xml>namnområde.</xref:System.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: Den används för att läsa in XML-dokument och för att lösa externa resurser, till exempel entiteter, DTD: er eller scheman, och importera eller include-direktiven.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Du kan åsidosätta denna standardinställning genom att ange den <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>objekt som ska användas.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om du vill begränsa vilka resurser som den underliggande <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>kan komma åt, kan du använda ett XmlSecureResolver-objekt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: XmlSecureResolver wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver radbryts runt en konkret implementering av <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>och begränsar resurserna som den underliggande <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>har åtkomst till.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, XmlSecureResolver has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel har XmlSecureResolver möjlighet att förhindra domänerna omdirigering som sker från en referens till en inbäddad identifierare URI (Uniform Resource).

trans-unit.source: When you construct an XmlSecureResolver object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the XmlSecureResolver to determine security.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett XmlSecureResolver objekt du ange ett giltigt <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>implementering tillsammans med en URL, en instans av ett bevis-objekt eller en grupp, som används av XmlSecureResolver för att fastställa säkerhet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: Antingen en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>genereras eller befintliga en används och <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>anropas på den för att skydda den underliggande <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objekt kan innehålla känslig information, till exempel användarens autentiseringsuppgifter.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching XmlSecureResolver objects and should not pass the XmlSecureResolver object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: Du bör vara försiktig när cachelagring XmlSecureResolver objekt och inte passerar XmlSecureResolver objektet till en komponent som inte är betrodd.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Finns skillnader i säkerhetsinfrastruktur för kod som körs på .NET Framework CLR (CLR) och kod som körs på CLR som är integrerad i Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Detta kan leda till fall där CLR integrerats i koden som utvecklats för .NET Framework CLR fungerar annorlunda när den används på SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the XmlSecureResolver class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: En av dessa skillnader påverkar XmlSecureResolver klassen när du har bevis som baseras på en URL (det vill säga när du använder den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>metoden eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor).</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: Principen för matchning av mekanismen för SQL Server integrerad CLR använder inte den <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>eller <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>information.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: I stället ger den behörighet som baserat på det GUID som servern lägger till när sammansättningar läses.

trans-unit.source: When you use the XmlSecureResolver in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: När du använder XmlSecureResolver i SQL Server integrerat CLR, ange alla nödvändiga bevis direkt med hjälp av en angiven <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver 1.
trans-unit.target: Att använda en säker matchare 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en XmlSecureResolver med rätt behörighet.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>objekt som använder objektet XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Skicka den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>objekt till den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>metoden när du skapar den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objekt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a URL Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs) ] ## att begränsa åtkomst med hjälp av en URL-användning i <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>konstruktorn för att skapa ett XmlSecureResolver-objekt som tillåts ansluta till webbplatsen lokalt intranät.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a permission set 1.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs) ] ## in 1 att begränsa åtkomst med hjälp av en behörighet.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>objektet.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs) ] 2.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: Ange URL: er som du vill tillåta åtkomst till.

trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Add the web permissions to the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Lägg till webbehörigheter till den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>objekt.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs)] 4.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4 c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4 c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs) ] 4.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>konstruktorn för att skapa ett XmlSecureResolver-objekt med hjälp av behörighetsgruppen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs)] See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs) ] finns det <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>referenssida för ett annat exempel.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill begränsa åtkomst med hjälp av bevis kan du begränsa åtkomsten med hjälp av <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>konstruktorn och ange <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>Används för att skapa <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>som tillämpas på den underliggande <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSecureResolver calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver anropen <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>på den skapade <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>innan du öppnar några resurser.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Här följer några vanliga scenarier och typ av bevis ange för varje: – Om du arbetar i en fullständigt betrodd miljö, använda sammansättningen för att skapa bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs) ] -om du arbetar i en delvis betrodd miljö, kod eller data som kommer från en extern källa och du vet ursprung extern källa och har en verifierbar URI , Använd URI: N för att skapa bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs) ] - om du arbetar i en delvis betrodd miljö och du har kod eller data som kommer från en extern källa, men du inte vet ursprung extern källa, antingen: Ange den `evidence` parameter till `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Detta åtkomst ingen till resurser.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - eller - om ditt program kräver vissa åtkomst till resurser, begära bevis från anroparen.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: Att använda säker matcharen att läsa in en XSLT-formatmall 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en XmlSecureResolver med rätt behörighet.

trans-unit.source: Pass the XmlSecureResolver to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Skicka XmlSecureResolver till den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6; ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klassen med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> angivna.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-matcharen som är omslutna med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Behörigheten inställningen ska gälla för den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the permission set before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> anrop av <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> behörighetsgrupp innan du anropar metoden den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>metoden på den underliggande XML-lösaren.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klassen med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> angivna.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Här följer några möjliga scenarier och typ av bevis ange för varje scenario: – Om du arbetar i en fullständigt betrodd miljö, använda sammansättningen för att skapa bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs) ] -om du arbetar i en delvis betrodd miljö, kod eller data som kommer från en extern källa och du vet ursprung extern källa och har en verifierbar URI , Använd URI: N för att skapa bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs) ] - om du arbetar i en delvis betrodd miljö och du har kod eller data som kommer från en extern källa, men du inte vet ursprung extern källa, antingen: Ange den `evidence` parameter till `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Detta åtkomst ingen till resurser.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - eller - om ditt program kräver vissa åtkomst till resurser, begära bevis från anroparen.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-matcharen som är omslutna med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bevis som används för att skapa den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som ska kopplas till den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> anrop av <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> -metoden i den skapade <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> innan du anropar <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klassen med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> och URL: en.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-matcharen som är omslutna med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL: en som används för att skapa den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som ska kopplas till den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> anrop <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> på den skapade <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> innan du anropar <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Skapar bevis med den angivna URL: en.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: Den URL som används för att skapa bevis.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: Bevis som genereras från den angivna URL: en som definieras i standardprincipen.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Ställer in autentiseringsuppgifter som används för att autentisera webbegäranden.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Autentiseringsuppgifterna som ska användas för att autentisera webbegäranden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> sets the given credentials on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> anger de angivna autentiseringsuppgifterna för den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Om den här egenskapen inte har angetts standardvärdet <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, det vill säga den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> har inga autentiseringsuppgifter.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Avbildar en URI till ett objekt som innehåller den faktiska resursen.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> created in the constructor by calling <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> before calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anger tillfälligt den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> skapas i konstruktorn genom att anropa <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> innan du anropar <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> att öppna resursen.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: Den URI som returneras från <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: För närvarande används inte.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Typ av objekt ska returnera.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella versionen returnerar bara <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den dataström som returnerades genom att anropa <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Om en annan typ än <xref:System.IO.Stream>har angetts returnerar-metoden <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturnär inget eller en typen.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Angiven URI är inte en absolut URI.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Det finns ett körningsfel (till exempel en avbruten serveranslutning).

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront mappar en URI till ett objekt som innehåller den faktiska resursen.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: Den URI som returnerades från <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: För närvarande används inte.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Typ av objekt ska returnera.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella versionen returnerar bara <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den dataström som returnerades genom att anropa <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Om en annan typ än <xref:System.IO.Stream>har angetts returnerar-metoden <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Löser absolut URI från bas och relativa URI genom att anropa <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: Bas-URI som används för att matcha relativa URI: N.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: URI som används för att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: URI: N kan vara absolut eller relativ.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: Om absolut värdet effektivt ersätter den `baseUri` värde.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Om relativa kombineras med de `baseUri` att göra en absolut URI.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Absolut URI eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om relativ URI inte kan matchas (returneras genom att anropa <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> på den underliggande <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: relativeUriis .
